0001 function colored_sketch  =  colored_contours(input_image,ridge_skel,edge_skel);
0002 
0003 ridge_skel = clip(1.5*ridge_skel,0,1);
0004 edge_skel = clip(1.5*edge_skel,0,1);
0005 sz=  3;
0006 ridge_skel_u  = ordfilt2(ridge_skel,sz^2,ones(sz))/max(max(abs(ridge_skel(:))),eps);
0007 edge_skel_u   = ordfilt2(edge_skel,sz^2,ones(sz))/max(max(abs(edge_skel(:))),eps);
0008 fct =1.5;
0009 
0010 sum_other_colors = edge_skel_u + ridge_skel_u;
0011 colored_sketch(:,:,3) = max(input_image + ridge_skel_u - edge_skel_u,0);
0012 colored_sketch(:,:,2) = max(input_image + edge_skel_u - ridge_skel_u,0);
0013 colored_sketch(:,:,1) = max(input_image - sum_other_colors,0);
